testcase.name: The player is not for sale
testcase.system-out: Given a <futboll player> and a <team id>....................................passed When I press the "Comprar jugador" button AND the player is not for sale....passed Then I should be able to not buy............................................passed

testcase.name: The player does not exist
testcase.system-out: Given a <futboll player> and a <team id>....................................passed When I press the "Comprar jugador" button AND the player not exist..........passed Then I should be able to not buy............................................passed

testcase.name: Not having enough money
testcase.system-out: Given a <futboll player> and a <team id>....................................passed When I press the "Comprar jugador" button AND I don't have enough money.....passed Then I should be able to not buy............................................passed

testcase.name: Having enough money to buy a football player and the team there
testcase.system-out: Given a <futboll player> and a <team id>....................................passed When I press the "Comprar jugador" button AND I have enough money...........passed Then I should be able to buy my money should be increased...................passed

testcase.name: Having enough money to buy a football player but the team not exist
testcase.system-out: Given a <futboll player> and a <team id>....................................passed When I press the "Comprar jugador" button AND I have enough money but team not exist.passed Then I should be able to not buy............................................passed

testcase.name: main screen user
testcase.system-out: Given a user "user" and password "password".................................passed When <password> is empty and <user> is not empty............................passed Then should let me not access...............................................passed

testcase.name: main screen password
testcase.system-out: Given a user "user" and password "password".................................passed When <password> is not empty and user <user> is empty.......................passed Then should let me not access...............................................passed

testcase.name: user incorrect and password correct
testcase.system-out: Given a user "user" and password "password".................................passed When the <password> is valid and the <user> is invalid......................passed Then should let me not access...............................................passed

testcase.name: user and password are correct
testcase.system-out: Given a user "user" and password "password".................................passed When the <password> is valid and the <user> is valid........................passed Then should let me access...................................................passed

testcase.name: user correct and password incorrect
testcase.system-out: Given a user "user" and password "password".................................passed When the <password> is invalid and the <user> is valid......................passed Then should let me not access...............................................passed

testcase.name: Sell a player and that player does not belong to the team
testcase.system-out: Given a team and Player.....................................................passed When I want to sell a player but does not belong to the team................passed Then I can not put it on sale...............................................passed

testcase.name: Sell a player and that player not exist
testcase.system-out: Given a team and Player.....................................................passed When I want to sell a player, but that player does not exist................passed Then I can not put it on sale...............................................passed

testcase.name: Sell a player and that player does belong to the team
testcase.system-out: Given a team and Player.....................................................passed When I want to sell a player and exists and belongs to the team.............passed Then I can put it on sale...................................................passed

testcase.name: Sell a player and the player is already on sale
testcase.system-out: Given a team and Player.....................................................passed When I want to sell a player and is already sold............................passed Then I can not put it on sale...............................................passed

testcase.name: Sell a player and the team to which it belongs does not exist
